title: Palco House / Cecchi Millan
description: Palco house, designed for a young artist, is located on Algodões Beach, Maraú – BA. The 70m2 pavilion is a functional architectural solution that houses two suites and a living room with an integrated kitchen. The linear layout of the spaces allows for an opening to the surrounding view and vegetation, with the integration of nature.

title: Nendo designs intertwined cottages for Hand in Hand House in Karuizawa
